column2: Construct an ontology focused on the following: food deserts. Provide it in valid Turtle/RDF format, excluding any extra text.
column3: ```turtle@prefix rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> .@prefix rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> .@prefix xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> .@prefix fd: <http://example.org/food_desert#> .fd:FoodDesert rdf:type rdfs:Class ; rdfs:label "Food Desert" ; rdfs:comment "A geographic area where access to affordable, healthy, fresh food is limited or unavailable" .fd:hasLocation rdf:type rdf:Property ; rdfs:label "has location" ; rdfs:comment "The geographic location where the food desert is found" ; rdfs:domain fd:FoodDesert ; rdfs:range xsd:string .fd:hasPopulationDensity rdf:type rdf:Property ; rdfs:label "has population density" ; rdfs:comment "The population density of the food desert area" ; rdfs:domain fd:FoodDesert ; rdfs:range xsd:float .fd:hasIncomeLevel rdf:type rdf:Property ; rdfs:label "has income level" ; rdfs:comment "The average income level of the residents in the food desert area" ; rdfs:domain fd:FoodDesert ; rdfs:range xsd:float .fd:lacksFoodStore rdf:type rdf:Property ; rdfs:label "lacks food store" ; rdfs:comment "Indicates whether the food desert area lacks a food store" ; rdfs:domain fd:FoodDesert ; rdfs:range xsd:boolean .fd:lacksTransportation rdf:type rdf:Property ; rdfs:label "lacks transportation" ; rdfs:comment "Indicates whether the food desert area lacks transportation to food stores" ; rdfs:domain fd:FoodDesert ; rdfs:range xsd:boolean .```
